title: Ozzylizardâ€™s Corner of The Wiki
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --zero: 0;
}
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --header-title: "SCP Foundation";
    --header-subtitle: "Research and Containment Site-44";
    --logo-image: url("https://nu-scptheme.github.io/Black-Highlighter/img/logo.svg");

    --pale-accent: 93, 125, 0 ;
    /* light red, for visited links */
    --bright-accent: 0, 133, 5;
    /* bright red */
    --medium-accent: 46, 100, 44;
    /* medium red - the "default" accent color */
    --dark-accent: 3, 100, 15;
    /* dark red */
    --alt-accent: 102, 221, 17;
    /* pale orange, for newpage links */

}
[[/module]]

[[include component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]

WHY DID YOU CLICK ON THIS?!

All photos are mine :]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[size 500%]]**HELLO!**[[/size]]
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
| name= http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/ozzylizard/OzzyChill
| align=center
| width=100%
| caption= **Chill.**
]]
[[include :topia:listusers-1 users="."]]
Hi, %%name%%!
[[include :topia:listusers-2]]
Hi, Person Without a Wikidot Account!
[[include :topia:listusers-3]]

It seems like youâ€™ve stumbled across my office/corner of the wiki. Welcome!

In case you canâ€™t tell, Iâ€™m [[*user OzzyLizard]]! Iâ€™m 100% most definitely not a bearded dragon in a trench coat. Welcome to my author page! Feel free to sit down and grab a drink or something idk.

##green|**Likes:**##
. Fun, short SCPs
. Animal/Biology-based SCPs
. Rain
. Green

##red|**Dislikes:**##
. Boring/Overly-complicated SCPs
. Incoherent narratives
. Wet socks 

You.. What? Personnel File? In-universe documentation? I mean sure. Here you go.

> **Name:** Cryptobiology Specialist F. Ozz
> 
> **Clearance Level:** 3 [[footnote]] But heâ€™s on thin ice.. - Director Carter [[/footnote]]
> 
> **Current Assignment:** Crypto/Xenobiological Research and Management of Site-44 Archives
> 
> **Profile:** According to Researcher Jordan, Ozz is a bit of an idio-

You what?! Unoriginal? I thought this was what everyone didâ€¦ 

Whatâ€™s that? You want to see my stuff? The stuff I made? The stuff Iâ€™ve created?

Ha! Nice joke-

Wait, you actually want to.. Oh, okay then. 

Stalling? No, (//chuckles awkwardly//).

----

**ATTENTION:** All new Site-44 staff must first visit Researcher Ozzâ€™s office in order to gain access to the Siteâ€™s files.

> **[BEGIN LOG]**
> 
> Welcome to Site-44. We haveâ€¦ *flicking of paper* (//pauses//) a lot of stuff. (//Very awkward coughing//) ANYWAY, so what brings you here? My stuff? Haha, my friend. Good joke! (//pauses//) You.. You actually want to see the stuff Iâ€™ve made..? 
> 
> (//Distant yelling//) No, Director, Iâ€™m not messing with the interns again. No, Iâ€™m.. uuuh. (//Distant mumbling//) Yes, sorry sir it wonâ€™t happen again. Yes..
> 
> (//40 seconds of awkward staring//) Huh, is that rain? I love the sound of rain. It always rains here, we are in Englan.. (//Gasps and points//) WHATâ€™S THAT OVER THERE!!?!!?!?!! 
> 
> (//Dramatically runs away//).
> 
> **[END LOG]**
.
.
.
.
##90C200|Access Granted##

Woooah, look all of these uuuuh cool pages (0_0). Feel free to check them out if you want, Iâ€™d recommend [REDACTED] and [DATA EXPUNGED]. [[footnote]] Data has been redacted for being too cool ðŸ˜Ž - O5-4 [[/footnote]]
